name: Unidentified_First_Order_officer_(Finalizer)
content:
A human officer served the First Order during its conflict with the Resistance. They were stationed in the control room of the bridge of the Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Finalizer when FN-2187 and the Resistance pilot Poe Dameron carried out an escape from the vessel. During the escape, the officer informed General Armitage Hux that Dameron and FN-2187 had taken out the Star Destroyer's turbolasers. The Aurebesh cuff-title on their left sleeve said "Hal," designating them as a squad leader.
Despite having a speaking line and appearing in close-up, the character was portrayed by an uncredited actor in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
